snippet: Finding a missing Malaysia Airlines plane may hinge on whether searchers can narrow down where they need to look using satellite data that is inexact and has never been used for that purpose before, search and rescue experts say....

headline.print_headline: Searchers Relying on Satellite Data to Find Plane
headline.main: Searchers Relying on Satellite Data to Find Plane

lead_paragraph: Finding a missing Malaysia Airlines plane may hinge on whether searchers can narrow down where they need to look using satellite data that is inexact and has never been used for that purpose before, search and rescue experts say.
